Policy"}]}],["$","div",null,{"children":[["$","p",null,{"className":"subText pt-5","children":["Abluva, Inc. (“Abluva,” “we,” “our,” or “us”) is committed to transparency with respect to its data collection and use practices. This Cookie Policy (“Cookie Policy”) explains how we use cookies and related technologies throughout our Websites and your related choices. Please note that this Cookie Policy is provided as a statement about privacy and Abluva’s use of cookies and similar technologies. Capitalized terms used in this Cookie Policy but not defined herein will have the meanings given to them in Abluva’s ",["$","$La",null,{"href":"/support/privacy-policy","rel":"noopener noreferrer","target":"_blank","className":"primary-color underline","children":"Privacy Policy"}],"."]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"mainText","children":"“Cookies” Explained and Why They are Used"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"A cookie is a small piece of data (text file) that a website – when visited by a user – asks your browser to store on your computer or device in order to remember information about you, such as your IP address, device identifier, language and/or currency preference or login information. You can find more information about cookies at: www.allaboutcookies.org or www.youronlinechoices.eu."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"We also use a range of similar technologies that are deployed when you visit a website, and/or may be embedded in the web pages and/or emails you receive, and typically stored on your computer, device and/or web browser, including, “web beacons” and/or “tracking tags” which are small graphics, which may be invisible to you, that have a unique identifier and are embedded in the web pages you visit and/or email message you receive, and “embedded scripts” which are programming codes that are designed to collect information about your interactions with our Websites, such as the links you click on."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"We’ll use the term “cookie” throughout this Cookie Policy to cover all of these technologies, but we’ll make sure we provide you with clear details about them all so that you can make informed choices about your cookie settings."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"mainSubText","children":"Types of Cookies"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"Session and Persistent Cookies"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText md:ml-10 ml-5","children":["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"Session Cookies – these are cookies which expire once you close your web browser; and"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Persistent Cookies – these are cookies which stay on your device for a set period of time or until you delete them."}]]}]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"mainSubText","children":"First and Third Party Cookies"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText md:ml-10 ml-5","children":["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"First-party cookies – First-party cookies are directly stored by the website (or domain) you visit. These cookies allow website owners to collect analytics data, remember language settings, and perform other useful functions that provide a good user experience."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Third-party cookies – Third-party cookies are created by domains that are not the website (or domain) that you are visiting. These are usually used for online-advertising purposes and placed on a website through adding scripts or tags. A third-party cookie is accessible on any website that loads the third-party server’s code."}]]}]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"mainText","children":"The Categories of Cookies Used by Abluva"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"Abluva, or our service providers acting on our behalf, uses the types of cookies identified above in the following ways:"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"Strictly Necessary – These cookies are necessary for our Websites to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set or placed in response to actions made by you, which amount to a request for services from us, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in, or filling in forms. For example, Strictly Necessary cookies are used by us to:"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText md:ml-10 ml-5","children":["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"Remember information that you fill in when performing certain activities while accessing or using our Websites."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Pass information from one page to the next, for example when filling out support forms or surveys."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Provide our Websites according to your preferences such as language and location."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Read your browser and device settings to optimize the display of our Websites."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Locate and identify misuse of our Websites."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Load our Websites uniformly to maintain accessibility."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Fraud prevention and authentication."}]]}]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"Performance/Analytics Cookies - These cookies collect information about how visitors use our Websites, for instance which pages visitors go to most often, and if they get error messages from web pages or in interactions with our Websites. These cookies collect anonymous information on the pages visited. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. It is only used to improve how our Websites perform. Web analytics that use cookies to gather data to enhance the performance of a website fall into this category. For example, they may be used for testing designs and ensuring a consistent look and feel is maintained for the user. This category does not include cookies used for behavioral/targeted advertising networks. For example, Performance/Analytics cookies are used by us to:"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText md:ml-10 ml-5","children":["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"Maintain, operate, and continually improve our Websites."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Keep track of the number of visitors to the pages within our Websites."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Keep track of the length of time that each visitor spends on the pages and/or features of our Websites."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Determine the order in which a visitor visits the various pages and/or features of our Websites."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Determine the website a visitor was at before navigating to our Websites and the website a visitor is going to immediately after leaving our Websites."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Identify performance issues with our Websites (or any component thereof)."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Assess which parts of our Websites (or any component thereof) need improvement."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Obtain information from our email newsletters or other communications we send to you, including whether you opened or forwarded a newsletter or clicked on any of its content, which tells us about our newsletters’ effectiveness and helps us ensure that we’re delivering information that you find interesting."}]]}]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"Please refer to allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your username, language or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. These cookies can also be used to remember changes you have made to text size, fonts and other parts of web pages that you can customize. The information these cookies collect may be anonymized and they cannot track your browsing activity on other websites. For example, we use Functionality cookies to:"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText md:ml-10 ml-5","children":["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"Remember information that you fill in when performing certain activities in connection with your use of our Websites."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Store your preferences such as language."}]]}]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"Targeting/Advertising Cookies – These cookies are designed to gather information from you and used to deliver advertisements more relevant to you and your interests. They are also used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement as well as help measure the effectiveness of the advertising campaigns. They are usually placed by advertising networks with the website operator’s permission. They remember that you have visited a website and this information is shared with other organizations such as advertisers. Targeting or advertising cookies are almost always third party cookies, which means, the cookies follow the user as they visit other websites. Abluva uses the third party service providers listed below that use these cookies to:"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText md:ml-10 ml-5","children":["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"Advertise Abluva and is products and services across the Internet."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Track the performance and efficacy of our advertisement campaigns."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Tailor our fonteting to better suit your needs and only display ads that are relevant to you."}]]}]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"Please refer to the privacy policies linked below of the third party advertising services currently utilized through our Websites:"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText md:ml-10 ml-5","children":["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc","children":["$","li",null,{"children":["Google (DoubleClick Digital Marketing): ",["$","$La",null,{"href":" www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/","className":"underline primary-color","rel":"noopener noreferrer","target":"_blank","children":" www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/"}]]}]}]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"mainText","children":"How to Manage Your Cookie Preferences"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"Where required by applicable law, we will obtain your consent prior to setting cookies (except for strictly necessary cookies). Most web and mobile device browsers automatically accept cookies, but if you prefer, you can change your browser to prevent that or to notify you each time a cookie is set."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"In order to manage your cookie preferences, you may alter the cookie settings in your browser settings at any time. You may accept all, or certain, cookies. If you do disable our cookies in your browser settings, you may find that certain features and/or functionality of our Websites will not work."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":["To learn more about cookies, including how to manage cookies and opt-out of cookies being placed on your device, please visit ",["$","$La",null,{"href":"http://www.allaboutcookies.org/manage-cookies/index.html","className":"underline primary-color","rel":"noopener noreferrer","target":"_blank","children":" http://www.allaboutcookies.org/manage-cookies/index.html"}]," tracking is widespread over the internet, there are things you can do to minimize these activities with respect to browser cookies."]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"Do Not Track Settings"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText md:ml-10 ml-5","children":["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":["You may turn on the Do Not Track (“DNT”) setting in your browser, which will enable your browser to send a special signal to websites, analytics companies, plug in providers, and other web services you encounter while browsing to stop tracking your activity. To turn on your DNT signal, please visit ",["$","$La",null,{"href":"https://allaboutdnt.com/#adjust-settings","className":"underline primary-color","rel":"noopener noreferrer","target":"_blank","children":" https://allaboutdnt.com/#adjust-settings"}],". Please note that not all companies will respond to or honor DNT signals."]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Note that Abluva does not process or respond to web browsers’ “do not track” signals or other similar transmissions that indicate a request to disable online tracking of users who use our Websites."}]]}]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"Targeting/Advertising Cookies"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText md:ml-10 ml-5","children":["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":["You can opt out of targeted advertising by:",["$","p",null,{"className":"subText md:ml-10 ml-5 text-left","children":["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":["Facebook : ",["$","$La",null,{"href":"https://www.facebook.com/settings/?tab=ads","className":"underline primary-color","rel":"noopener noreferrer","target":"_blank","children":"  https://www.facebook.com/settings/?tab=ads"}]]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":["Google : ",["$","$La",null,{"href":"https://www.google.com/settings/ads/anonymous","className":"underline primary-color","rel":"noopener noreferrer","target":"_blank","children":" https://www.google.com/settings/ads/anonymous"}]]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":["Bing : ",["$","$La",null,{"href":" https://advertise.bingads.microsoft.com/en-us/resources/policies/personalized-ads","className":"underline primary-color","rel":"noopener noreferrer","target":"_blank","children":" https://advertise.bingads.microsoft.com/en-us/resources/policies/personalized-ads"}]]}]]}]}]]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":["In addition, some of our third party analytics and/or advertising/targeting partners may be members of the Network Advertising Initiative (“NAI”) or Digital Advertising Alliance (“DAA”) Self-Regulatory Program for Online Behavioral Advertising. NAI and DAA each provide information regarding procedures for opting-out of targeted online advertising from participating companies.",["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText md:ml-10 ml-5","children":["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc text-left","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":["For information from NAI about opting out,",["$","$La",null,{"href":"https://optout.networkadvertising.org/?c=1","className":"underline primary-color","rel":"noopener noreferrer","target":"_blank","children":" click here"}]]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":["For information from DAA about opting out, ",["$","$La",null,{"href":"https://youradchoices.com/control","className":"underline primary-color","rel":"noopener noreferrer","target":"_blank","children":" click here"}]," or visit: ",["$","$La",null,{"href":"http://optout.aboutads.info/.","className":"underline primary-color","rel":"noopener noreferrer","children":" http://optout.aboutads.info/."}]]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","li",null,{"children":["For information about DAA’s AppChoices application, ",["$","$La",null,{"href":"https://youradchoices.com/appchoices","className":"underline primary-color","rel":"noopener noreferrer","target":"_blank","children":"click here"}]]}]]}]}]]}]]}]}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"mainText","children":"Modifications to this Policy"}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","p",null,{"className":"subText","children":"Abluva reserves the right to amend this Cookie Policy at any time and without notice. The updated and amended Cookie Policy will be effective upon posting. When we make material changes to this Cookie Policy, we’ll provide you with prominent notice e.g., by displaying a prominent notice on our Websites. If you do not agree to the revised Cookie Policy, you should alter your preferences, or consider ceasing use of our Websites. By continuing to access or make use of any of our Websites after the changes become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised Cookie Policy."}],["$","br",null,{}],["$","br",null,{}]]}]]}],null],"segment":"__PAGE__"},"styles":[]}],"segment":"cookie-policy"},"styles":[]}],"segment":"support"},"styles":[]}],["$","$Lb",null,{}],["$","footer",null,{"className":"text-white
